title: Serif Chicken e-nipple
content:
This e with a nipple is on the tip of my tongue.  
Anyone know it by name?

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140805135926im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Chick_5849.jpg)
author: sullivanj

comments.content:
Hi John,

that smells like a [squooshed](http://web.archive.org/web/20140805135926/http:/typophile.com/wiki/squooshed) [Bembo (Extra?) Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20140805135926/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/bembo_extra_bold/?&sample_text=Chicken%20Wings&sample_size=48).  
F
And that's possibly the best / most memorable ID thread title I've seen. :)

Almost as great as ["What to do with my Centaur?"](http://web.archive.org/web/20140805135926/http:/typophile.com/node/17628) and ["Colon Alignment"](http://web.archive.org/web/20140805135926/http:/typophile.com/node/53255).
